name: wget2
description: Successor of GNU Wget, a file and recursive website downloader
unavailable_reason: Repository is on gitlab, not GitHub. Limited analysis available.

readme.summary: Clear introduction and comprehensive feature list with detailed build instructions, but completely lacks usage examples, quick start guide, and troubleshooting information.
readme.top_issue: No usage examples or quick start - user can build it but has no idea how to actually use wget2 after installation

concerns: No commits in over 6 years (last commit May 2019)

maintenance.summary: wget2 is abandoned with no development activity since May 2019 and no engagement indicators over the past 6 months.
